entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
